head.supplied: Saturday 2/5/63. ¶ My dear & beloved Phemy ¶ ¶ I am not quite certain, whether I can enjoy the pleasure of seeing you & your sister this evening. Should I be prevented I will come out to you to morro...

div.p: RB MSS M41, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

MS envelope front: 'Miss Euphemia Henderson | favor of Mrs M'Haffie | Terrace | next to Prince of Wales Hotel | St Kilda | Ferd Mueller. | May 2.5./1863'. Front postmarked 4 May 1863, Melbourne. Back postmarked 5 May 1863, St Kilda. Saturday 2/5/63.

I am not quite certain, whether I can enjoy the pleasure of seeing you & your sister this evening. Should I be prevented I will come out to you to morrow or after to morrow in the evening. Mr Fletcher has as yet not shown himself for receiving the Starlings.
The Sydney Steamer seems not yet to be here; so I do not know yet about Mr Moon's visit
